law.catch_line: Payments From Ordinary Revenue; Cash On Hand
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] Payments authorized by appropriation acts shall be made from the ordinary revenue, if no other provision is expressly made therefor. Cash from the ordinary revenue on hand at the beginning of each fiscal year shall be carried to the account of the ordinary revenue of that year. Chapter 29: Payments from ordinary revenue; cash on hand [ Text of section as recodified by 2012, 165, Sec. 112 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] Payments authorized by appropriation acts shall be made from budgeted revenue, if no other provision is expressly made for such payment.
